entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:36 a.m. EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 11.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Low 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle. Fog patches. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers or drizzle. High 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers or drizzle in the morning. Rain at times heavy beginning near noon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 29 April 2023
